column5: 2015 at her sons residence. funeral services will be held tuesday
column7: 2015 at 2-p. m. from nelson funeral home. burial will follow in fayette memorial gardens cemetery. the family will receive friends tuesday from 1-2 p. m. at the funeral home. trent mobley and rick mc. cabe will officiate. survivors include three sons: richard randolph mobley
column10: eight grandchildren and seventeen great-grandchildren. she was preceded in death by her husband: william cecil ""bill"" mobley
column12: sisters: virginia wheeler and peggy justice.
